Your destination is Jamaica.

Yes, {{c1::I'm going|I am going|I'm going to go|I am going to go}} (I / go) to Jamaica.

column2: What do you say to Joe in these situations?
column3:
You and some friends are planning a holiday in Spain. You have already decided to rent a car while you're there.

Joe asks you:
How do you plan to travel in Spain? By train?
You say:
No, {{c1::we're renting|we are renting|we're going to rent|we are going to rent}} (we / rent) a car.

column2: What do you say to Joe in these situations?
column3:
Joe reminds you that you have to phone your sister. You had completely forgotten about it.

Joe asks you:
Did you phone your sister?
You say:
No, I completely forgot. {{c1::I'll phone|I will phone}} (I / phone) her now.

column2: What do you say to Joe in these situations?

column2: What do you say to Joe in these situations?

column2: What do you say to Joe in these situations?

What are you doing?

{{c1::I'm going to close|I am going to close|I'm closing|I am closing}} (I / close) the window.
